block.p: American League MINNESOTA TWINS--Traded RHP Matt Kinney and C Javier Valentin to the Milwaukee Brewers for RHP Matt Yeatman and RHP Gerard Oakes. SEATTLE MARINERS--Named Bob Melvin manager. TEXAS RANGERS--Agreed to terms with LHP C.J. Nitkowski and LHP Ray Beasley on minor league contracts.

American League MINNESOTA TWINS--Traded RHP Matt Kinney and C Javier Valentin to the Milwaukee Brewers for RHP Matt Yeatman and RHP Gerard Oakes. SEATTLE MARINERS--Named Bob Melvin manager. TEXAS RANGERS--Agreed to terms with LHP C.J. Nitkowski and LHP Ray Beasley on minor league contracts.

National League CHICAGO CUBS--Named Dusty Baker manager. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Named Rich Dauer third base coach and Dave Nelson first base coach. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Traded OF Gene Kingsale to the Detroit Tigers for C Michael Rivera. SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS--Waived OF Tsuyoshi Shinjo.

National Basketball Association MEMPHIS GRIZZLIES--Placed F Robert Archibald on the injured list. Activated C Cezary Trybanski from the injured list. MIAMI HEAT--Activated C Ken Johnson from the injured list. Placed C Sean Marks on the injured list.

National Football League CINCINNATI BENGALS--Signed DT Mario Monds to the practice squad. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Waived RB Autry Denson. Re-signed DB Brian Leigeb. TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS--Placed RB Travis Stephens on injured reserve. Signed DT DeVone Claybrooks from the practice squad.

National Hockey League COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Placed C Tyler Wright and C Espen Knutsen on injured reserve. Recalled LW Andrej Nedorost and C Blake Bellefeuille from Syracuse of the AHL. NASHVILLE PREDATORS--Recalled F Nathan Perrott from Milwaukee of the AHL.
COLLEGE BARTON--Announced the resignation of Todd Bailess, women's soccer coach. CLARKSON--Fired Mark Morris, hockey coach. Named Fred Parker interim hockey coach.
